DOC.brief_summary: This study is conducted to evaluate the effectiveness of forced air warming using upper and lower body blankets by measuring core body temperature in patients undergoing video-assisted thoracic surgery in the lateral decubitus position over 2 hours of general anesthesia.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Upper and Lower Body Air Warming in Patients Undergoing Thoracic Surgery
DOC.criteria: patients undergoing videoassisted thoracic surgery over 2 hours ASA I, II and III age over 18 years refuse to enroll patients with fever or hypothermia before surgery patients who required changes of position during surgery
